survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate the satisfaction levels of digital nomads with their current workspace setups, including coworking spaces, cafes, and home offices, to identify common challenges and preferences.

questions.question_text: What type of workspace do you primarily use as a digital nomad?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for simplicity. Ensure 'Other' includes a text field for specification.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button with optional text input for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What type of workspace do you primarily use as a digital nomad?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your current primary workspace?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency in measuring satisfaction.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with your current primary workspace?

questions.question_text: What are the top three factors you consider when choosing a workspace?
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice checkbox with a limit of 3 selections. Include an 'Other' option with a text field.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox with max 3 selections and optional text input for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What are the top three factors you consider when choosing a workspace?

questions.question_text: Please describe any challenges you face in your current workspace.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback. Ensure the text box is large enough for detailed responses.

script.question_text: Please describe any challenges you face in your current workspace.

questions.question_text: How often do you switch workspaces in a typical week?
answer_options: Never (I use the same workspace every day)
questions.client_notes: Single-choice question to understand mobility patterns.

script.question_text: How often do you switch workspaces in a typical week?
answer_options: Never (I use the same workspace every day)
